summary: Diff adds a Motoko single-actor backend with per-user state (profiles, free-trial claimed status, orders, leads/forms/chatbot leads) plus a React/TanStack Router frontend with core routes, Internet Identity auth hooks, dashboard UI, chatbot widget, manual payment info component, and free-trial claim UI. Several BuildRequest items cannot be verified due to truncated/omitted page files; one unrequested external promo link is clearly added.

missing_requirements.requirement: After successful login, redirect the user to a Dashboard that displays the user identity info available from Internet Identity.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows an Internet Identity login hook and a /dashboard route, but there is no evidence in the shown files that login triggers a redirect to /dashboard, nor that the Dashboard displays Internet Identity identifier details (e.g., principal).

missing_requirements.requirement: The page includes the message “Work will begin only after payment confirmation.” (English).
missing_requirements.reason: ManualPaymentInfo includes the sentence but prefixed with a warning symbol, so the exact required message string is not shown as-is in the diff excerpt.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer promotional link to caffeine.ai with UTM parameters.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest; adds third-party promotion/link in site footer.

hallucinated_features.description: Chatbot UI is labeled 'Nova AI Assistant' and uses AI-themed wording/emojis.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly asks for a non-AI, deterministic scripted FAQ widget; while the script is deterministic, branding it as an AI assistant is an unrequested/possibly conflicting presentation.
